H0.text: Transports oxygen and nutrients throughout the body is the function of the skeletal system.

H1.text: Supports and protects tissues and organs is the function that best describes the skeletal system.

H2.text: Removing harmful wastes from the cells of the body is the function of the skeletal system.

H3.text: Breaking down food into a form that cells can use is the best description of the function of the skeletal system.

A4.text: Bones are rigid organs providing structural support for the body, assistance in movement by opposing muscle contraction, and the forming of a protective wall around internal organs.

A5.text: A skeleton is the structural frame that supports the body of most animals.
